amendment.description: To end food stamp eligibility for convicted violent rapists, pedophiles, and murderers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1056 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1056 proposed by Senator Stabenow for Senator Vitter.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1056 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1056 proposed by Senator Stabenow for Senator Vitter.
